languages.text: "Все просто: на этом поле вы играете с судьбой. Выбираете шарик и отдаете его Заклепке, крысе моей. Если она за три минуты загонит шар в лузу, помеченную красным — вы победили. Не загонит — проиграли. Вот так просто".

"It's simple: on this board, you play with fate. Choose a ball and give it to Bolts, my rat. If she rolls your ball into the pocket marked in red within three minutes, you win. If she doesn't, you lose. Simple."
languages.original_text: "Все просто: на этом поле вы играете с судьбой. Выбираете шарик и отдаете его Заклепке, крысе моей. Если она за три минуты загонит шар в лузу, помеченную красным — вы победили. Не загонит — проиграли. Вот так просто".

traits.locale_text: "It's simple: on this board, you play with fate. You choose a ball and give it to Bolts, my rat. If she rolls the ball into the pocket marked with red in three minutes or less, you win. If she doesn't, you lose. Easy."

"It's simple: on this board, you play with fate. You choose a ball and give it to Bolts, my rat. If she rolls the ball into the pocket marked with red in three minutes or less, you win. If she doesn't, you lose. Easy."

"It's simple: on this board, you play with fate. Choose a ball and give it to Bolts, my rat. If she rolls your ball into the pocket marked in red within three minutes, you win. If she doesn't, you lose. Simple."

"It's simple: on this board, you play with fate. Choose a ball and give it to Bolts, my rat. If she rolls your ball into the pocket marked in red within three minutes, you win. If she doesn't, you lose. Simple."

"It's simple: on this board, you play with fate. Choose a ball and give it to Bolts, my rat. If she rolls your ball into the pocket marked in red within three minutes, you win. If she doesn't, you lose. Simple."

"It's simple: on this board, you play with fate. Choose a ball and give it to Bolts, my rat. If she rolls your ball into the pocket marked in red within three minutes, you win. If she doesn't, you lose. Simple."

languages.text: « C'est simple comme bonjour : sur ce plateau, il s'agit de jouer avec le destin. Vous choisissez une bille à donner à Bolts, mon rat. S'il fait rouler votre bille dans la poche rouge en moins de trois minutes, vous gagnez. Sinon, vous perdez. Tout simplement. »
languages.original_text: "It's simple: on this board, you play with fate. Choose a ball and give it to Bolts, my rat. If she rolls your ball into the pocket marked in red within three minutes, you win. If she doesn't, you lose. Simple."

traits.locale_text: « C'est simple comme bonjour : sur ce plateau, il s'agit de jouer avec le destin. Vous choisissez une bille à donner à Bolts, mon rat. S'il fait rouler votre bille dans la poche rouge en moins de trois minutes, vous gagnez. Sinon, vous perdez. Tout simplement. »

languages.text: «Es muy sencillo: en este tablero, se juega con el sino. Elija una bola y désela a mi rata Tornillo. Si hace rodar la bola hasta el orificio marcado en rojo en menos de tres minutos, usted gana. Si no lo hace, pierde. Sencillísimo».
languages.original_text: "It's simple: on this board, you play with fate. Choose a ball and give it to Bolts, my rat. If she rolls your ball into the pocket marked in red within three minutes, you win. If she doesn't, you lose. Simple."

traits.locale_text: «Es muy sencillo: en este tablero, se juega con el sino. Elija una bola y désela a mi rata Tornillo. Si hace rodar la bola hasta el orificio marcado en rojo en menos de tres minutos, usted gana. Si no lo hace, pierde. Sencillísimo».

languages.text: 「簡単ですよ。このボードで運命を占うのです。ボールを選んで、私のネズミのボルトに渡してください。この子が3分以内に赤でマークされたポケットにあなたのボールを転がし入れたらあなたの勝ち。入れなければあなたの負けです。シンプルでしょう」
languages.original_text: "It's simple: on this board, you play with fate. Choose a ball and give it to Bolts, my rat. If she rolls your ball into the pocket marked in red within three minutes, you win. If she doesn't, you lose. Simple."

traits.locale_text: 「簡単ですよ。このボードで運命を占うのです。ボールを選んで、私のネズミのボルトに渡してください。この子が3分以内に赤でマークされたポケットにあなたのボールを転がし入れたらあなたの勝ち。入れなければあなたの負けです。シンプルでしょう」

languages.text: “规则很简单，这个游戏全靠运气。选一个玻璃球，交给我的老鼠波尔特。如果她能在三分钟内把你选的球推进带着红色标记的洞里，那您就赢了。如果她没推进去，那您就输了。就是这么简单。”
languages.original_text: "It's simple: on this board, you play with fate. Choose a ball and give it to Bolts, my rat. If she rolls your ball into the pocket marked in red within three minutes, you win. If she doesn't, you lose. Simple."

traits.locale_text: “规则很简单，这个游戏全靠运气。选一个玻璃球，交给我的老鼠波尔特。如果她能在三分钟内把你选的球推进带着红色标记的洞里，那您就赢了。如果她没推进去，那您就输了。就是这么简单。”

languages.text: "Es ist simpel: Auf diesem Brett spielt Ihr mit dem Schicksal. Wählt eine Kugel und gebt sie Bolzo, meiner Ratte. Wenn sie Eure Kugel innerhalb von drei Minuten in die rote Tasche rollt, habt Ihr gewonnen. Wenn nicht, habt Ihr verloren. Simpel."
languages.original_text: "It's simple: on this board, you play with fate. Choose a ball and give it to Bolts, my rat. If she rolls your ball into the pocket marked in red within three minutes, you win. If she doesn't, you lose. Simple."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist simpel: Auf diesem Brett spielt Ihr mit dem Schicksal. Wählt eine Kugel und gebt sie Bolzo, meiner Ratte. Wenn sie Eure Kugel innerhalb von drei Minuten in die rote Tasche rollt, habt Ihr gewonnen. Wenn nicht, habt Ihr verloren. Simpel."

languages.text: "Gayet basit. Bu tahtada kadere karşı oynuyorsunuz. Bir top seçip onu sıçanım Cıvata'ya veriyorsunuz. Topu üç dakika içinde kırmızıyla işaretlenmiş boşluğa atarsa kazanıyorsunuz. Atamazsa kaybediyorsunuz. Basit yani."
languages.original_text: "It's simple: on this board, you play with fate. Choose a ball and give it to Bolts, my rat. If she rolls your ball into the pocket marked in red within three minutes, you win. If she doesn't, you lose. Simple."
